resources.string:
•The game will start a countdown and after vibrate for a specific amount of times
 
 •Count the vibrations and answer when the game asks
Set your eduFUN booklet in front of you and open the color game page
The game will ask for a color on screen
Point the camera to the color and press "OK"
Set your eduFUN booklet in front of you and open the animal game page
The game will ask for an animal by its name
Point the camera to the QR code next to the animal and press "OK"
An app with different educational games for kids, using different interactions with the devices
